name: Adventures: A World Without Limits
description:
Hi there !

Welcome to the world, you can start your own adventure and be the hero, defeating the powerful enemies that will appear as you progress in your adventure

Adventures Kit:

Adventures - A World Without Limits is free but you can contribute any amount you'd like. Contributing $3 or more will give you with the Adventures Kit!

What You Get:
  • The Adventures Soundtrack including  song variants not included in the game
  • 4K Resolution Wallpapers for mobile and desktop

Adventures: A World Without Limits was developed by QuadroAdvy, i constantly working on projects - any contributions will go right towards making my future games more awesome!

Minimum Requirements
  • 1 Ghz Processor
  • 1 GB of Ram
  • x86 OS
  • Recommended Requirements
    • 2 Ghz Processor
    • 4 GB of Ram
    • x64 OS
